Heat Templates
##############

F5® provides two categories of Heat templates that can be used to deploy F5® services in Openstack: 'F5-Supported' and 'unsupported'.

F5-Supported
************

.. include:: ../../f5_supported/README.rst
    :start-line: 3

    :glob:

    supported/*
